item.title: Help with owner commands!?!?!? plz
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

[code]if(playerRights >= 3)){

sendQuest("@dbl@mervboyj’s Personal Commands",

8170);

sendQuest("@blu@::pvpon @red@ Turns Pking on if it

is currently off", 8171);

sendQuest("@blu@::pvpoff @red@ Turns Pking off if it

is currently on", 8172);

sendQuest("@blu@::mute @red@ Permanently mutes a

player, doesn’t run out", 8173);

sendQuest("@blu@::unmute @red@ Unmutes a perm or

temp muted player", 8174);

sendQuest("@blu@::nowildme @red@ Makes me

unable to be attacked by players", 8175);

sendQuest("@blu@::wildme @red@ Makes me

attackable again by other players", 8176);

sendQuest("@blu@::gear @red@ Gives me some decent

Pk gear to kill people", 8177);

sendQuest("@blu@::givemod @red@ Makes a player

into a Moderator instantly", 8178);

sendQuest("@blu@::giveadmin @red@ Makes a player

into an Admin instantly", 8179);

sendQuest("@blu@::demote @red@ Turns an Admin or

Mod back into a normal player", 8180);

sendQuest("@blu@::update @red@ Use this command

to trigger an update if needed", 8181);

sendQuest("@blu@::reboot @red@ This command will

kick ALL players on the server", 8182);

sendQuest("@blu@::reset @red@ Use on an Admin who

can’t use ::wildme etc anymore", 8183);

sendQuest("@blu@::nowildy @red@ Use on a player to

make them unattackable by others", 8184);

sendQuest("@blu@::wildy @red@ Use on a player to

make them attackable by players", 8185);

sendQuest("@blu@::ownage @red@ This will make all

of my combat stats go to 500", 8186);

sendQuest("@blu@::ownageoff @red@ Makes my stats

go back to their regular levels", 8187);

sendQuest("@blu@::hide @red@ Makes me invisible in

the main game window to players", 8188);

sendQuest("@blu@::show @red@ This will make me

visible again if I am invisible", 8189);

sendQuest("@blu@::rclickipban @red@ Makes the right

click option change to IP ban", 8190);
}[/code]

and to make commands only work for owners its…

else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME") && !playerRights = 3){

hope this helps you…

item.title: Help with owner commands!?!?!? plz
item.dc:creator: @mervboyj mervboyj
item.description:
@mervboyj wrote:

ok i have all these commands and there only for owners well my 2 friends are the co-owners and these commands somehow only work for me and i want them to work for my friends too can someone help me?

heres commands

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mervboyj”)) {

sendQuest("@dbl@mervboyj’s Personal Commands",

8170);

sendQuest("@blu@::pvpon @red@ Turns Pking on if it

is currently off", 8171);

sendQuest("@blu@::pvpoff @red@ Turns Pking off if it

is currently on", 8172);

sendQuest("@blu@::mute @red@ Permanently mutes a

player, doesn’t run out", 8173);

sendQuest("@blu@::unmute @red@ Unmutes a perm or

temp muted player", 8174);

sendQuest("@blu@::nowildme @red@ Makes me

unable to be attacked by players", 8175);

sendQuest("@blu@::wildme @red@ Makes me

attackable again by other players", 8176);

sendQuest("@blu@::gear @red@ Gives me some decent

Pk gear to kill people", 8177);

sendQuest("@blu@::givemod @red@ Makes a player

into a Moderator instantly", 8178);

sendQuest("@blu@::giveadmin @red@ Makes a player

into an Admin instantly", 8179);

sendQuest("@blu@::demote @red@ Turns an Admin or

Mod back into a normal player", 8180);

sendQuest("@blu@::update @red@ Use this command

to trigger an update if needed", 8181);

sendQuest("@blu@::reboot @red@ This command will

kick ALL players on the server", 8182);

sendQuest("@blu@::reset @red@ Use on an Admin who

can’t use ::wildme etc anymore", 8183);

sendQuest("@blu@::nowildy @red@ Use on a player to

make them unattackable by others", 8184);

sendQuest("@blu@::wildy @red@ Use on a player to

make them attackable by players", 8185);

sendQuest("@blu@::ownage @red@ This will make all

of my combat stats go to 500", 8186);

sendQuest("@blu@::ownageoff @red@ Makes my stats

go back to their regular levels", 8187);

sendQuest("@blu@::hide @red@ Makes me invisible in

the main game window to players", 8188);

sendQuest("@blu@::show @red@ This will make me

visible again if I am invisible", 8189);

sendQuest("@blu@::rclickipban @red@ Makes the right

click option change to IP ban", 8190);
}
